item.title: Email articles with Blog Buzz Machine!
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: Found an article via Blog Buzz Machine that you want to keep? Just click the "Email Article" link, enter in your email address and select whether or not you're using an HTML compatible email reader. It's that easy!
item.excerpt:encoded: Found an article via Blog Buzz Machine that you want to keep? Just click the "Email Article" link, enter in your email address and select whether or not you're using an HTML compatible email reader. It's that easy!
